name: Snow Exploration
description:
A wintery first person platformer/exploration game. Explore the mountain and collect all the stars, but beware the cold! Rest at a fire to restore warmth. Swing your lantern at torches to light them up and open new paths. Enemies can be melted or attacked with snowballs.

Controls
- use WASD to move, run off a ledge to jump
- click left to swing lantern/throw a snowball
- Esc to quit the game

notes: Unfortunately I underestimated the scope and ran out of time, so this game is not finished. It should be playable though and for that reason I would like to submit it anyway.
